mapper.select: SELECT a.assessment_id, a.patient_id, a.scale_id, a.total_score, a.assessment_result, a.assessment_date, a.answers, a.recommendation, s.name AS scale_name FROM assessments a LEFT JOIN scales s ON a.scale_id = s.scale_id WHERE a.patient_id = #{patientId} ORDER BY a.assessment_date DESC

SELECT a.assessment_id, a.patient_id, a.scale_id, a.total_score, a.assessment_result, a.assessment_date, a.answers, a.recommendation, s.name AS scale_name FROM assessments a LEFT JOIN scales s ON a.scale_id = s.scale_id WHERE a.assessment_id = #{assessmentId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO assessments ( patient_id, scale_id, total_score, assessment_result, answers, recommendation ) VALUES ( #{patientId}, #{scaleId}, #{totalScore}, #{assessmentResult}, #{answers,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{recommendation} )
